external_games.name: ROCHE LIMIT: The Death of CMK

name: Roche Limit: The Death of CMK
storyline:
Entirely by accident, you help a man evade a mysterious danger inside his home,
You enter the building and, upon discovering the same strange horrors, find that there’s no one to aid you and your escape.
summary:
Roche Limit: The Death of CMK is a horror-surrealist style PowerPoint game made over the course of eight months. It features over 1,500 slides and 80+ unique hand drawn scenes.
The game is a follow-up to the developer's 2019 project The EdCo Incident.

2 additional endings where planned for and worked on as a possible update for the game but have been dropped in favor of a new game that continues the themes with a new story.
An OST for the cut ending scenes was released with interludes and titles, ending 2's title was The Golden Age and ending 3's title was Depi Lontan.
